mapper.insert: INSERT INTO professor( profe_no, semester_no, major_no, profe_name , profe_id, profe_pw, profe_gender, profe_birth, profe_phone, profe_email, profe_post, profe_addr, profe_extra_addr, profe_auth, profe_date )VALUES( #{profe_no}, #{semester_no}, #{major_no}, #{profe_name}, #{profe_id}, #{profe_pw}, #{profe_gender}, #{profe_birth}, #{profe_phone}, #{profe_email}, #{profe_post}, #{profe_addr}, #{profe_extra_addr}, '교수', SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT m.* FROM PROFESSOR p INNER JOIN MAJOR m ON p.MAJOR_NO = m.MAJOR_NO WHERE p.PROFE_NO = #{profe_no}
SELECT s.* FROM PROFESSOR p INNER JOIN SEMESTER s ON p.SEMESTER_NO = s.SEMESTER_NO WHERE p.profe_no=${profe_no}
select * from professor where profe_id = #{profe_id} and profe_pw = #{profe_pw}
SELECT PROFE_ID , COUNT(*) FROM PROFESSOR p GROUP BY p.PROFE_ID HAVING count(*)>0;
